title: What is the Enneagram and how does it relate to time and consciousness?
first_phrase: In the last part of this text, the author discusses the concepts of the enneagram and time, and how they are related to each other. The enneagram is a tool used to identify different personality types that are connected to specific fears and compulsions. These compulsions prevent individuals from fully grasping the concept of time and living in the present moment. By breaking these compulsions, individuals can achieve a higher state of consciousness and become more in touch with their true essence. The author mentions that by completing the exercises in the book, readers will be able to attain balance and become more present. This concept is similar to the one depicted in Dante's Paradiso Terrestre, where individuals achieve a state of perfect happiness.
